actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to adjust the compensation of the Assistant Secretary for Health of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Director of the National Institutes of Health, and the Director of each of the Institutes within the National Institutes of Health.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Specifies $52,000 as the minimum annual rate of basic pay for the Assistant Secretary for Health of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Director of the National Institutes of Health, and the Director of each institute within the National Institutes of Health.

titles.title: A bill to adjust the compensation of the Assistant Secretary for Health of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Director of the National Institutes of Health, and the Director of each of the Institutes within the National Institutes of Health.
